Rulings.Edison:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
● Like all ignition effects, the ① can be activated before "Bottomless Trap Hole" can be used. Bottomless can then be chained to the ①.
Rulings.Tengu: ●The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Dark Armed Dragon' can still be Special Summoned while there are non-DARK monsters in your GY.
● 'Dark Armed Dragon's' effect that destroys 1 card is an Ignition Effect. Removing 1 DARK monster from play is a cost.
● 'Dark Armed Dragon' can't be Special Summoned from the GY, even if it was properly Summoned beforehand.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Dark Armed Dragon" can still be Special Summoned while there are non-DARK monsters in your GY.\n2. The effect of "Dark Armed Dragon" that destroys 1 card is an Ignition Effect. Removing 1 DARK monster from play is a cost.\n3. "Dark Armed Dragon" cannot be Special Summoned from the GY, even if it was properly Summoned beforehand.

PSCT.Edison:
Ⓢ Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
Ⓢ Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 3 DARKs in your GY.
① You can banish 1 DARK from your GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
PSCT.Tengu:
Ⓢ Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
Ⓢ Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 3 DARKs in your GY.
① You can banish 1 DARK from your GY, then target 1 card on the field;
destroy it.
